name: Paths Of Destiny - For the Classic Gamers Out There!
blurb: MUD style, sandbox, fantasy game made by and for classic gamers who miss story and passion and interactivity in their games!

rewards.reward: No Reward

You will gain our thanks of course, and your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Donator" forever! You will also have access to our BETA testing and get a one month Gold Membership. All physical rewards will be sent out shortly after the project closes, virtual rewards will be given on release of the game. This applies to all rewards below!
You will gain our thanks of course, and your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Donator" forever! You will also have access to our BETA testing and get a six month Gold Membership.

You will gain our thanks, as well as your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Donator" forever! You will get a signed postcard from the PoD team, you will also have access to our BETA testing and get a one year Gold Membership.

You will get a signed postcard from the PoD team as well as a button with original artwork from our artists, you will also have access to our BETA testing and get a six month Platinum Membership. You will also get a pack of enhancing items to start with. Run Speed Potions and Exp and Gold Gain Trinkets.

You will gain our thanks, as well as your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Producer" forever! You will get a signed postcard from the PoD team as well as a button, magnet and keychain with original artwork from our artists AND a 36X24 poster and a PoD Calendar of original art from our game AND a Gel Mouse-pad with original artwork AND a Paths of Destiny T-Shirt, you will also have access to our BETA testing and get a lifetime Mithril Membership. You will also get ten packs of enhancing items to start with. Run Speed Potions and Exp and Gold Gain Trinkets PLUS access to a backers only section in game with daily events and a producer only title awarded to your characters. You will also be able to name TWO Full Body SETS of armor of your choice (any slots) AND four weapons of your choice, they all have an extra socket for gems and grow with your character. (Names subject to approval). You also receive a Charm that causes hidden random events throughout the game. You will also get a producer only Mount.

You will gain our thanks, as well as your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Producer" forever! You will also be able to name TWO Full Body SETS of armor of your choice (any slots) AND four weapons of your choice, they all have an extra socket for gems and grow with your character. (Names subject to approval). You also receive a Charm that causes hidden random events throughout the game. You will also get a producer only Mount. LIMITED: We will take your likeness and put you into game as an NPC that players can interact with. You will be able to name this NPC and create a quest that he/she gives characters.

You will gain our thanks, as well as your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Executive Producer" forever! You will get a signed postcard from the PoD team as well as a set of buttons with all the different races, a set of magnets and a keychain with original artwork from our artists AND a 36X24 poster and a PoD Calendar of original art from our game AND a Gel Mouse-pad with original artwork AND a Paths of Destiny T-Shirt, you will also have access to our BETA testing and get a lifetime Mithril Membership. You will also get twenty five packs of enhancing items to start with. Run Speed Potions and Exp and Gold Gain Trinkets PLUS access to a backers only section in game with daily events and an executive producer only title awarded to your characters. You will also be able to name TWO Full Body SETS of armor of your choice (any slots) AND four weapons of your choice, they all have an extra socket for gems and grow with your character. (Names subject to approval). You also receive a Charm that causes hidden random events throughout the game. You will also get an executive producer only Mount.

You will gain our thanks, as well as your name and website will be put on our backers page as "Executive Producer" forever! You will get a signed postcard from the PoD team as well as a set of buttons with all the different races, a set of magnets and a keychain with original artwork from our artists AND a 36X24 poster and a PoD Calendar of original art from our game AND a Gel Mouse-pad with original artwork AND a Paths of Destiny T-Shirt, you will also have access to our BETA testing and get a lifetime Mithril Membership. You will also get twenty five packs of enhancing items to start with. Run Speed Potions and Exp and Gold Gain Trinkets PLUS access to a backers only section in game with daily events and an executive producer only title awarded to your characters. You will also be able to name TWO Full Body SETS of armor of your choice (any slots) AND four weapons of your choice, they all have an extra socket for gems and grow with your character. (Names subject to approval). You also receive a Charm that causes hidden random events throughout the game. You will also get an executive producer only Mount. LIMITED: Our development team will use your likeness to put you into the game as the King or Queen of the human race. You get to name your character as well as create a quest line and rewards for your subjects!

This reward section is for advertisement purposes for companies to take part in. You will be given advertisement space on our site as well as a chance to do product placement in game in a tongue in cheek way (subject to approval) This is only for companies with products that are not offensive and can be viewed by an audience of all ages. For anyone donating more than $2000 and are not looking for sponsorship, we have super secret rewards for you. Contact us for details at the email given in the project description.
